messages.title: ISLINGTON'S CANCER CRISIS
messages.content: Shock as only 1 in 8 local women get essential cancer tests. 'Brown's broken cancer promises'

messages.title: Liberal Democrats are making the difference
messages.content: Bridget Fox's plan to cut NHS red tape to free more local doctors and nurses to care.

messages.title: MORE MONEY IN YOUR POCKET
messages.content: Lib Dems deliver lower taxes and win praise from national experts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bridget Fox's plan to cut NHS red tape to free more local doctors and nurses to care.
Lib Dems deliver lower taxes and win praise from national experts.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests strategic voting considerations where it ranks Liberal Democrats as the second choice after Labour, suggesting the tactical voting situation in the constituency.

issues.health: Highlighting the cancer crisis and 'Brown's broken cancer promises'.

leaflet.personalStatement: Bridget Fox has been campaigning for Islington for years.

politicalExperience.achievements: Bridget Fox has been campaigning for Islington for years and has a record of getting things done.

images.caption: Bridget Fox talking with locals about the healthcare crisis.
